0.4.0.en: Possible to turn on / off, change fan mode and fan level from the app (the device must be reinstalled for this). Removed duplicate triggers for temperature and humidity.n

1.1.0.en: Added support for Swing modes. Fixed settings page. Use Homey compose.

1.0.1.en: Added support for Swing modes. Use Homey compose.

1.2.0.en: Added 'Last seen' timestamp.  Added 'Sensibo offline' trigger.

1.2.1.en: Added support for 'Horizontal' and 'Both' swing modes. Added check for supported swing mode.

1.3.1.en: Added support for Climate React. Added condition for 'Climate React is enabled / disabled'. Changed minimum polling interval to 15 seconds.

1.4.0.en: Added support for timers. Added trigger for Climate React changed.

1.4.1.en: Added support for timers. Added trigger for Climate React changed.

1.5.1.en: Added trigger for AC state changes. Fixed minor bug when deleting devices.

1.6.1.en: Added triggers for timers. Added trigger for AC state changes. Fixed minor bug when deleting devices.

1.7.0.en: Dynamic list of modes and fan levels when setting from flows.

1.7.1.en: Dynamic list of modes and fan levels when setting from flows.

1.8.0.en: Changed minimum temperature to 10 deg. C. Updated to SDK 3.

1.8.1.en: Changed minimum temperature to 10 deg. C. Updated to SDK 3.

1.9.0.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.9.1.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.9.2.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.9.3.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.9.4.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.9.5.en: Added horizontal swing (capability and action card). Added action to sync the power state. Added action to control Pure Boost. Added action to control the AC light. Added fan levels (Medium high,  Medium low, Quiet). Fixes for pairing.

1.10.0.en: Added support for Sensibo Pure and Sensibo Room Sensor.

1.10.1.en: Added support for Sensibo Pure and Sensibo Room Sensor.

1.13.0.en: 2023-09-26 New maintainer and contacts. 5015 install at transfer.

1.14.0.en: ADD: Initial support for Air PRO.

1.15.0.en: ADD: Support for Sensibo Air PRO and it's measurements

1.15.1.en: FIX: Check for undefined values on capability updates.

1.16.0.en: ADD: Clean filter alarm and trigger.

1.16.2.en: ADD: Filter sensors for cleaning times.

1.16.3.en: FIX: "se_ac_state_changed": Invalid value for token on. Expected boolean but got object

1.16.5.en: FIX: Handle errors if triggers fail (catch rejections)

1.16.7.en: FIX: for non Sensibo Air Pro capabilities check.

1.16.8.en: FIX: Sky, Air and RoomSensor failing due to new features from Air Pro.

1.17.0.en: Support for Sensibo Elements and it's measurements

1.17.1.en: Support for Sensibo Elements and it's measurements

1.17.2.en: ADD: Battery measurement to Room Sensor

1.17.3.en: ADD: Offline trigger for Sensibo Elements

1.17.4.en: FIX: No sensor value updates with 1.17.3

1.17.5.en: FIX: No sensor value updates with 1.17.3

1.18.0.en: Switch from http.min to axios, add support for gzipped results from the Sensibo API. Add some delays in APi queries to mitigate rate limiting. Not the perfect solution, but helps.

1.18.3.en: FIX: HTTP 400 Errors on certain flow cards using PUT.

1.18.4.en: FIX: Cleanup Axios methods for Sensibo API calls

1.18.5.en: FIX: Improved API error reporting to the user

1.18.9.en: FIX: Target temperature Fahrenheit handling in Sensibo API

1.19.0.en: BREAK: Require Homey OS 12.2.0 and above. Sensibo Elements: Revert measure_tvoc capability to Homey default capability, adds approximation from ppb to µg/m³.

1.19.1.en: BREAK: Sensibo Pure: replaces custom *Air quality* capability and trigger with Homey default *Air quality level* capability and flow cards
